phase.name: Alpha
phase.description: Working towards feature completeness (bug tracking, time tracking, and orphan ideas)

milestone.name: Adopt Orphan Ideas
milestone.description: Create a system for managing orphan ideas that can be adopted into the project structure as phases, milestones, objectives, deliverables, or actions.

objective.name: Revamp Data Storage
objective.description: Replace single project.json with folder-based storage using .prism directory structure for better organization and scalability.
